content: enhance your decor theme with a fun crochet blanket that adds charm to a room choose from 4 different color combinations and stitch up the perfect rainbow ocean jungle or space themed blanket using shades of bernat blanket bernat baby blanket bernat mist-ical and bernat blanket brights the pattern uses the popular c2c technique as you do double_crochet chain slip_stitch colorwork and more the possibilities are endless so customize your color pallets for the perfect addition to any room materials version 1 - rainbow bernat® baby blanket ™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a baby blue 04202 2 balls or 248 yds/227 m contrast b seafoam 04736 1 ball or 177 yds/162 m contrast c buttercup 04746 2 balls or 340 yds/311 m contrast d coral blossom 04747 2 balls or 397 yds/363 m contrast e baby pink 04200 2 balls or 326 yds/298 m
